name: Cubic Dimension Summon
text: Send 1 "Cubic" monster you control to the Graveyard, and play 1 "Cubic" monster from your hand that is 1 Level higher than the monster you send to the Graveyard. The ATK of the monster you played with this Skill is equal to its original Level x 500. This Skill can only be used once per turn and twice per Duel.
